page.body: There is a creative tension between parents and children as the children see a growing need for Internet and e-commerce marketing/services (i.e., a new service developing websites for small restaurant owners) and a greater movement toward sustainable equipment which is more flexible and adaptable to the need for restaurants to "re-engineer" their own layouts and designs. There is certain tension between family members (the haves) and non-family members (the have-nots) and this is most felt in the “regional” locations.
